palmos

Class NetSocketAddrType

  • java.lang.Object
    • palmos.NetSocketAddrType

  • public class NetSocketAddrType
extends java.lang.Object
    Structure used to hold a generic socket address. This is a generic struct designed to hold any type of address including internet addresses. This structure directly maps to the BSD unix struct sockaddr.

      • netIPAddrLocal

        public static final int netIPAddrLocal
        Constant that means "use the local machine's IP address
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • family

        public short family
        Address family, one of the NetSocketAddrEnum values

      • b0

        public byte b0
        14 bytes of address. This will vary depending on the type of address. If this is an internet address, the first 2 bytes will be the port number and the second 4 bytes will be the IP address in Network, and the rest zeros. UInt8 order
